## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/time-pitch-algorithm-settings] for possible values. The system throws an exception if you set this property to a value other than one of the defined constants.

# audioTimePitchAlgorithm

**Instance Property**

The processing algorithm to use for scaled audio edits.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioTimePitchAlgorithm: AVAudioTimePitchAlgorithm { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/time-pitch-algorithm-settings] for possible values. The system throws an exception if you set this property to a value other than one of the defined constants.
title: audioTimePitchAlgorithm
